original_text: But people everywhere will one day recognize the Lord's great glory. Those people will fill the whole earth, as the waters fill the sea. But people everywhere will one day recognize the Lord's great glory. Those people will fill the whole earth, as the waters fill the sea.
korean_text: 이는 물이 바다를 덮음 같이 여호와의 영광을 인정하는 것이 세상에 가득함이니라

sentences.original_text: But people everywhere will one day

sentences.korean_translation: 주님의 위대한 영광을 알게 될 것이다

sentences.original_text: Those people will fill the whole earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람들은 온 땅을 채울 것이다

sentences.original_text: as the waters fill the sea
